title: Paris Saint-Germain FC - Wikipedia
snippet: Paris Saint-Germain are the most popular football club in France, accounting for 22% of the country's fan base. With an estimated 35 million fans, PSG are also one of the most followed teams in the world. The Parc des Princes has been its home ...
